column1: Local Foods////Very vegetarian friendly and really delicious.  All the side salads and soups I've tried have been great (especially the kale salad)
column2: and the falafal sandwich is amazing.  It gets crowded during the lunch rush
column3: but they move the line along pretty efficiently
column4: and if you are there on the later side (after about 1:30)
column5: there's rarely a line at all.
